title: Northern Cardinal in Winter
description: A vibrant male cardinal perched on a snow-covered branch during the early morning hours. The contrast between the bright red plumage and white snow creates a striking composition.

title: Ruby-throated Hummingbird
description: Captured mid-flight as this tiny jewel hovers near a feeder, wings beating at incredible speed. The iridescent throat catches the morning light beautifully.

title: Bald Eagle Portrait
description: A majestic bald eagle showcasing the intense gaze and detailed feather patterns. The piercing yellow eyes and sharp beak demonstrate the power of this apex predator.
